description: This file provides a minimal API client for frontend-backend communication, including functions to get the API base URL, perform GET and POST requests, and handle configuration errors.

methods.name: getApiBase
methods.description: Returns the configured backend API base URL from environment variables, preferring REACT_APP_API_BASE and falling back to REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL.

methods.name: buildUrl
methods.description: Constructs a full URL from a given path and optional query parameters, based on the API base URL.

methods.name: apiGet
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the constructed URL, throwing an error if the API base is not configured or the request fails.

methods.name: apiPost
methods.description: Performs a POST request to the constructed URL with the provided body, throwing an error if the API base is not configured or the request fails.
